title: Unlocking Observation Haki in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Have $750,000.
steps.content: Have $750,000. The Instinct Teacher in the Upper Skylands will sell you the skill for gold. Make sure you have enough funds to buy this aura!

steps.title: Be level 300.
steps.content: Be level 300. You have to be over level 300 to purchase the ability.

steps.title: Defeated the Saber Expert boss.
steps.content: Defeated the Saber Expert boss. He's in the jungle.

steps.title: Travel to the highest island of the Skylands.
steps.content: Travel to the highest island of the Skylands. There's a small temple inside where you can find an arrow pointing to a crevice. Either destroy the cloud you're standing on to make it disappear or slide down the crevice. You'll be teleported to the main Upper Skylands area. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Find the Instinct Trainer.
steps.content: Find the Instinct Trainer. Follow the tree branch from the first Upper Skylands sub-island to find another island with a temple. Enter the temple, and you'll see the Instinct Trainer standing in a corner. If you meet the requirements, you'll be able to buy the ability for $750,000.

steps.title: Press E or K (PC), tap Instinct (Mobile), or press the left D-pad (controller).
steps.content: Press E or K (PC), tap Instinct (Mobile), or press the left D-pad (controller). This keypress will activate the aura.

steps.title: See enemies and players through walls.
steps.content: See enemies and players through walls. You can also see them from a further distance away and see how much health they have.

steps.title: Dodge incoming attacks easily.
steps.content: Dodge incoming attacks easily. The more you level up Observation, the more dodges you'll unlock.

steps.title: Level Observation as you use it.
steps.content: Level Observation as you use it. Below is a list of how many dodge charges you can expect as you get experience in the ability: 0 EXP | Level 1 | 2 Charges 50 EXP | Level 2 | 3 Charges 330 EXP | Level 3 | 4 Charges 815 EXP | Level 4 | 5 Charges 1417 EXP | Level 5 | 6 Charges 2090 EXP | Level 6 | 7 Charges 2824 EXP | Level 7 (Max) | 8 Charges Once you reach the max level of Observation Haki, you can upgrade it to V2 in the Third Sea. [2] X Research source
